verses.verse: Then we turned <S%H6437><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> to Bashan <S%H1316><s%>: and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> us, he and all his people <S%H5971><s%>, to battle <S%H4421><s%> at Edrei <S%H154><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Fear <S%H3372><s%> him not: for I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> him, and all his people <S%H5971><s%>, and his land <S%H776><s%>, into thy hand <S%H3027><s%>; and thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> unto him as thou didst <S%H6213><s%> unto Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>.

So the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> into our hands <S%H3027><s%> Og <S%H5747><s%> also, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, and all his people <S%H5971><s%>: and we smote <S%H5221><s%> him until none was left <S%H7604><s%> to him remaining <S%H8300><s%>.

And we took <S%H3920><s%> all his cities <S%H5892><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>, there was not a city <S%H7151><s%> which we took <S%H3947><s%> not from them, threescore <S%H8346><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>, all the region <S%H2256><s%> of Argob <S%H709><s%>, the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>.

All these cities <S%H5892><s%> were fenced <S%H1219><s%> with high <S%H1364><s%> walls <S%H2346><s%>, gates <S%H1817><s%>, and bars <S%H1280><s%>; beside unwalled <S%H6521><s%> towns <S%H5892><s%> a great <S%H3966><s%> many <S%H7235><s%>.

And we utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them, as we did <S%H6213><s%> unto Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, utterly destroying <S%H2763><s%> the men <S%H4962><s%>, women <S%H802><s%>, and children <S%H2945><s%>, of every city <S%H5892><s%>.
But all the cattle <S%H929><s%>, and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%>, we took for a prey <S%H962><s%> to ourselves.

And we took <S%H3947><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%> out <S%H3947><s%> of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> that was on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, from the river <S%H5158><s%> of Arnon <S%H769><s%> unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%>;
( Which Hermon <S%H2768><s%> the Sidonians <S%H6722><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> Sirion <S%H8303><s%>; and the Amorites <S%H567><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> it Shenir <S%H8149><s%>;)

All the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain <S%H4334><s%>, and all Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and all Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, unto Salchah <S%H5548><s%> and Edrei <S%H154><s%>, cities <S%H5892><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>.

For only Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> remained <S%H7604><s%> of the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of giants <S%H7497><s%>; behold, his bedstead <S%H6210><s%> was a bedstead <S%H6210><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>; is it not <S%H3808><s%> in Rabbath <S%H7237><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>? nine <S%H8672><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and four <S%H702><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of it, after the cubit <S%H520><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%>.

And this land <S%H776><s%>, which we possessed <S%H3423><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>, from Aroer <S%H6177><s%>, which is by the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon <S%H769><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof, gave <S%H5414><s%> I unto the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and to the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>.

And the rest <S%H3499><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and all Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, being the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%>, gave <S%H5414><s%> I unto the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>; all the region <S%H2256><s%> of Argob <S%H709><s%>, with all Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, which <S%H1931><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of giants <S%H7497><s%>.

Jair <S%H2971><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> all the country <S%H2256><s%> of Argob <S%H709><s%> unto the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of Geshuri <S%H1651><s%> and Maachathi <S%H4602><s%>; and called <S%H7121><s%> them after his own name <S%H8034><s%>, Bashanhavothjair <S%H1316><s%> <S%H2334><s%>, unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.
And I gave <S%H5414><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> unto Machir <S%H4353><s%>.

And unto the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and unto the Gadites <S%H1425><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> from Gilead <S%H1568><s%> even unto the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon <S%H769><s%> half <S%H8432><s%> the valley <S%H5158><s%>, and the border <S%H1366><s%> even unto the river <S%H5158><s%> Jabbok <S%H2999><s%>, which is the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>;

The plain <S%H6160><s%> also, and Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and the coast <S%H1366><s%> thereof, from Chinnereth <S%H3672><s%> even unto the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the plain <S%H6160><s%>, even the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, under Ashdothpisgah <S%H798><s%> <S%H794><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>. Ashdothpisgah; or, the springs of Pisgah, or, the hill

And I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you at that time <S%H6256><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> you this land <S%H776><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it: ye shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> armed <S%H2502><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your brethren <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, all that are meet <S%H1121><s%> for the war <S%H2428><s%>. meet: Heb. sons of power

But your wives <S%H802><s%>, and your little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and your cattle <S%H4735><s%>, ( for I know <S%H3045><s%> that ye have much <S%H7227><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%>,) shall abide <S%H3427><s%> in your cities <S%H5892><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> you;

Until the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have given rest <S%H5117><s%> unto your brethren <S%H251><s%>, as well as unto you, and until they also possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> them beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>: and then shall ye return <S%H7725><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto his possession <S%H3425><s%>, which I have given <S%H5414><s%> you.

And I commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> all that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> unto these two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>: so shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> unto all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> whither thou passest <S%H5674><s%>.
Ye shall not fear <S%H3372><s%> them: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> he shall fight <S%H3898><s%> for you.
And I besought <S%H2603><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

O Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, thou hast begun <S%H2490><s%> to shew <S%H7200><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> thy greatness <S%H1433><s%>, and thy mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>: for what God <S%H410><s%> is there in heaven <S%H8064><s%> or in earth <S%H776><s%>, that can do <S%H6213><s%> according to thy works <S%H4639><s%>, and according to thy might <S%H1369><s%>?

I pray thee, let me go over <S%H5674><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> that is beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, that goodly <S%H2896><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>.

But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was wroth <S%H5674><s%> with me for your sakes, and would not hear <S%H8085><s%> me: and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Let it suffice <S%H7227><s%> thee; speak <S%H1696><s%> no more <S%H3254><s%> unto me of this matter <S%H1697><s%>.

Get thee up <S%H5927><s%> into the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah <S%H6449><s%>, and lift up <S%H5375><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>, and northward <S%H6828><s%>, and southward <S%H8486><s%>, and eastward <S%H4217><s%>, and behold <S%H7200><s%> it with thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>: for thou shalt not go over <S%H5674><s%> this Jordan <S%H3383><s%>. Pisgah: or, the hill

But charge <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and encourage <S%H2388><s%> him, and strengthen <S%H553><s%> him: for he shall go over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%>, and he shall cause them to inherit <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%>.
So we abode <S%H3427><s%> in the valley <S%H1516><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Bethpeor <S%H1047><s%>.
